segments.text: Has your son started school yet , Tom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Next week , it ’ s going to be quite a shock for him !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ ll get used to it . They always do . I still remember when my daughter started . Are you going with him on his first day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You bet . I wouldn ’ t miss it !
segments.speaker: S2
